Hi people!

I've been using heritrix3 now, and as I have written before, af=
ter Gordon has changed default character encding to utf-8 and the ReplayCha=
rSequence().toString() method, there has been some significant drop in the =
crawl performance. Here is a snapshot from a profiler that shows that there=
 might even be a memory-leak in some of those methods http://dl.getdropbox.=
com/u/1571029/yourkitprofiler.jpg

Gordon, could you please have a look at =
that and possibly try to fix it?

Thanks in advance.

cheers,
Ikrom (@saplo=
.com)
